Comment:
Hi everyone!

Here is a game which ended in a Low Draw for Yours Truly.  I got greedy in the middlegame with some pawn grabbing that backfired on me.  Under normal circumstances, 3 pawns for the piece is enough compo. and indeed the material count is zero.  However, if the extra piece is a bishop and there is a pair of them, and you have a knight, then heaven help you!  I found myself in that very position and thankfully Heaven did save me 10 rating points but boy it was a struggle.  So how did all this happen? Well, read on .......
1. ...... c5. Sicilian Defense.
2. c3. Closed Sicilian.
3. e5 - starting to transpose into an Alekhine's Defense.
3. e5 - starting to transpose into an Alekhine's Defense.
5. Bc4 - development.
5. Bc4 - development.
5. Bc4 - development.
5. Bc4 - development.
7. dxe4 - pawn trade.
7. dxe4 - pawn trade.
7. dxe4 - pawn trade.
7. dxe4 - pawn trade.
9. Nc3 - more development.
9. Nc3 - more development.
9. Nc3 - more development.
9. Nc3 - more development.
11. a3 - to prevent a move such as Nb4.
11. a3 - to prevent a move such as Nb4.
11. a3 - to prevent a move such as Nb4.
11. a3 - to prevent a move such as Nb4.

14. ...... Qxe5 - oops and double oops!  After this plethora of exchanges I am now a pawn down.  For the foreseeable future, however I am keeping Henry upright and praying that my opponent will slip up.

16. Qg4 - with my material deficit it is imperative I keep my pieces active.

18. Red1 - threatening Bxg6 discovering an attack onto the Wicked Witch of the West.  Thierry, however, sees this attack and the Witch moves out of the way.

19. ..... axb6 - trying to neutralise the deficit by doubling Thierry's pawns.

21. Qxb6 - Glenda snaps up the loose pawn on b6 but does this mean the end of my problems?  We shall see.

22. Bxg6? - in hindsight this was a big error but I simply thought that after PxB, RxB I would be two pawns up.  Yup I got greedy and I got my knuckles rapped big time!

24. Bxf7+ the only way to minimise the damage is to isolate all of Thierry's remaining pawns so that they become targets for my remaining pieces.

26. Qxe5 - so Thierry dangles another pawn in Glenda's fizz.  I think this pawn capture was safe enough.  This brings the material count back to zero but Thierry has the better of it I fear.
